post.body: The follow-back rate. I summarized it here http://twitter.com/stefant/statuses/783124617
I'm an experiment :-)
nice to know I'm the first one to follow you :)
thanks for the cool link :)
exactly! Also, in the meantime, I'm preparing my trip to Amsterdam using the advice or all the nice people here on twitter.
of course I see it :) and remember, it's not spam, it's just my little experiment with twitter.
- I was outta town when it happened, when I get back I was already at 1200. Too bad :)
I checked it out on Google Maps and it seemed more than OK, it's even better when you guys give me some more feedback :)
Ceintuurbaan crossing with Ferdinand Bolstraat
the offers on vrbo.com are great, thanks
Can't wait for the uberVU - http://twitter.com/ubervu / http://www.ubervu.com/ - project to get rolling!
Enjoying @overheardonline's tweets, it's a great project, gathering the most interesting quotes from all over the internet.
A strange allura/ surrounds Komura;/ am I alone in supposin'/ that Stefan is Osen? - poem from @pharbeson
Also thanks to all of you who gave me tips, advices, opinions for the Amsterdam trip. They helped so much!
For those who missed the experiment, Google is your friend http://tinyurl.com/6z5bj5 :)
Thanks to all of you who participated in my social experiment. Now it's over. I'll go on twitting on my real account - @stefant :) see ya!
nice stuff to read on Amsterdam @purplehayz's website
I found an apartment rental in Amsterdam - 550 EUR for 7 nights - in a quiet area, 10 minutes walk to the center. What do you think?
thanks @barryfromboston and @makochan200 guys for their tips on email/ PM
I've decided about the Amsterdam trip - no hotel, no hostel. Gonna rent an apartment for 1 week. Any tips?
